options.content:
This dashboard provides the information required to analyse the flow execution requests within the Cortex Innovation platform.

|Filter  |Description|
|--------|-----------|
| Tenant | List of tenants. |
| System | List of systems. |
| Node | List of hosts that processed the requests. |
| Package Name | List of packages. |
| Flow Name | List of flows that have execution requests. |
| Status Code | List of [status codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypertext_Transfer_Protocol#Status_codes) found in the HTTP responses. |
| Result | List of results found in the HTTP responses. |
| Initiator IP Address | List of IP addresses for the initiators of the requests. |
| Interval | List of intervals to perform the time series aggregations upon. This only affects the graphs on this dashboard. |
| Custom Filter | Enables filtering on all available values including those that are not exposed by default. |

All filters (excluding Interval and Custom Filter) will display their available options dependant on the preceeding filters selected.

# Overview  
Key flow execution request metrics for the specified time range.  
  
**Note:** The Interval filter does not affect these values.

panels.description: Displays the total number of flow execution requests during the specified time range.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} [$__range]))

sum(count_over_time({job="flows", RequestStatus="Error", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Displays the total number of flow execution requests that errored during the specified time range.
panels.title: Total Requests Errored

panels.description:
Displays the percentage of errored flow execution requests against the total flow execution requests during the specified time range.

| Threshold | Value | Colour |
|------------------|-----------|------------|
| OK  | < 5% | green |
| WARNING |  > 5% | orange |
| CRITICAL |   > 10% | red |
panels.title: Request Error Rate

panels.description: Displays the mean duration in seconds for flow execution requests during the specified time range.

targets.expr: avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]) by (Api)

panels.title: Mean Request Duration

options.content:
# Requests
Flow execution request history for the specified time range.

panels.description:
Displays the:
- count of all flow execution requests
- mean duration in seconds for all flow execution requests

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter.  Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous $Interval.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} [$Interval]))

avg by (Type) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval]))

min by (Type) (min_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval]))

max by (Type) (max_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval]))

sum(count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} [$Interval]))

avg by (Type) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error",  Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$Interval]))

panels.title: Requests

panels.description:
Displays the 10 most executed flows during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (FlowName) (count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json [$__range])))

bottomk(10, sum by (FlowName) (count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json [$__range])))

topk(10, avg by (FlowName) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range])))

bottomk(10, avg by (FlowName) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range])))

sum by (FlowName) (count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json [$__range]))

sum by (FlowName) (count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json [$__range]))

avg by (FlowName) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

min by (FlowName) (min_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

max by (FlowName) (max_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

panels.title: Top 10 Requests by Count

panels.description:
Displays the 10 least executed flows during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list. Also any flows with zero executions will not be displayed.
panels.title: Bottom 10 Requests by Count

options.content:
# Errors
Errored flow execution request history for the specified time range.

panels.description:
Displays the:
- count of errored flow execution requests
- mean duration in seconds for errored flow execution requests 

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter.  Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous $Interval.
panels.title: Errored Requests

panels.description:
Displays the 10 most errored (by status code and result) flows during the specified time range with their mean, minimum and maximum duration in seconds.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (FlowName, StatusCode, Result) (count_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json [$__range])))

avg by (FlowName, StatusCode, Result) (avg_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

min by (FlowName, StatusCode, Result) (min_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

max by (FlowName, StatusCode, Result) (max_over_time({job="flows", Type="Cortex", RequestStatus="Error", Api="Cortex.ServiceFabric.Service.ApiGateway.Controllers.StartExecutionsController.ExecuteFlow", Tenant=~"$Tenant", System=~"$System", Node=~"$Node", PackageName=~"$PackageName", FlowName=~"$FlowName", StatusCode=~"$StatusCode", Result=~"$Result", InitiatorIpAddress=~"$Initiator", Async=~"$Async"} | json Event_Duration_InMs="Event.Duration.InMs" | unwrap Event_Duration_InMs [$__range]))

panels.title: Top 10 Requests by Error Count

options.content:
# Duration
Flow execution request duration history for the specified time range.

panels.description:
Displays the:

- mean duration in seconds for all flow execution requests
- minimum duration in seconds for all flow execution requests
- maximum duration in seconds for all flow execution requests

Each data point value is calculated by aggregating requests based on the Interval filter. Currently each data point value will be an aggregation of the data for the previous 5m.
panels.title: Request Duration

panels.description:
Displays the 10 flows with the longest mean duration during the specified time range with their total count, error count, minimum and maximum duration in seconds.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list.
panels.title: Top 10 Longest Running Requests by Mean Duration

panels.description:
Displays the 10 flows with the shortest mean duration during the specified time range with their total count, error count, minimum and maximum duration in seconds.

Note: The Interval filter does not affect this list. Also any flows with zero executions will not be displayed.
panels.title: Top 10 Shortest Running Requests by Mean Duration
